Detailed Description

Direct evaluation of 2x2, 3x3 and 4x4 determinants.

Author:
fsm
    Modifications
    Peter Vanroose - 15 Oct. 2001 - Renamed from vnl_determinant to vnl_det
    Peter Vanroose - 15 Oct. 2001 - Added vnl_matrix_fixed interface
